title.value: Оценка морфологических и хозяйственно полезных признаков межсортовых гибридов свеклы столовой в условиях Беларуси
Morphological and economically useful traits estimation of red beet intervarietal hybrids in conditions of Belarus

journal.title: Agriculture and Plant Protection : scientific-practical journal

person.name: Opimakh, N.S., National Academy of Sciences, Minsk (Belarus). Institute for Vegetable Growing
Fedorova, M.I., All-Russian Research Institute  of Selection and Vegetable-Seed Industry, Moskow region (Russia)

abstract.value: In the conditions of the Republic of Belarus there were presented results of an assessment of 23 intervarietal hybrids of red table beet (Beta vulgaris) by their general yielding capacity. Objective of our research was to evaluate intervarietal beet hybrids by the complex of morphological and economically useful traits in order to select the most valuable breeding genotypes for further breeding. There were chosen samples for the further selection. As a result of the comparative evaluation there was found a significant difference in intervarietal hybrids by morphological, biological and economically valuable traits in their complex. As the initial material for further breeding beet there were identified the following the most valuable variety samples: 040-1, 040-2, 040-5, 043-26, 044-32, 041-19, 042-17, 0510-1, 0510-15.
